ISSUE.TITLE: Container build error due to missing config/webpack/tests
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Steps to reproduce the problem 1. Build container in github codespace ### Expected behaviour Successful build ### Actual behaviour Got an error ### Detailed description Error message: webpack config /workspaces/mastodon/config/webpack/tests.js not found, please run 'bundle exec rails webpacker:install' to install Webpacker with default configs or add the missing config file for your custom environment. The file was deleted in #27333 ### Mastodon instance _No response_ ### Mastodon version _No response_ ### Technical details _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Extract `path_without_format` private methd in accounts controller (#28091)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix devcontainer by not forcing `NODE_ENV` It should be picked from `.env.test` Fixes #27678
